short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can zoom and maximize the screenshare on Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you will be able to:
- Change the buttons bar orientation
- Toggle hide/show the buttons bar
- Set to fullscreen the Meet screenshare
- Zoom in the Meet screenshare
- Reset the Meet screenshare's zoom
- Zoom out the Meet screenshare
